long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Latin fusion restaurant in the Arts District. Offers a vegan section on the menu. All vegan items are also soy-free.
long_description.text/html: Latin fusion restaurant in the Arts District. Offers a vegan section on the menu. All vegan items are also soy-free.

entries.name: Bar+Bistro
entries.short_description: Latin fusion restaurant in the Arts District with a vegan section on the menu
entries.directions: Take the Charleston exit off the 15 and head east two blocks or so. Park behind the Arts Factory.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext:
Mundo is an upscale Mexican restaurant located in the Las Vegas Design Center at the World Market Center-Las Vegas. They have a dedicated section of their menu for vegetarians and they can leave off the cheese/dairy for vegans.

You might want to call first to verify that there isn't an event at the Design Center taking place.
long_description.text/html:
Mundo is an upscale Mexican restaurant located in the Las Vegas Design Center at the World Market Center-Las Vegas. They have a dedicated section of their menu for vegetarians and they can leave off the cheese/dairy for vegans.

You might want to call first to verify that there isn't an event at the Design Center taking place.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext:
Vegan Bystro and Bakery with a Caribbean & Southwest Fusion.

Pura Vida does not use high fructose corn syrup, artificial sweeteners, GMO's or hydrogenated oils. They offer items that are gluten-free, fair trade, organic or raw on request.

Pura Vida Bakery & Bystro is 100% vegan owned and operated.
long_description.text/html:
Vegan Bystro and Bakery with a Caribbean & Southwest Fusion.

Pura Vida does not use high fructose corn syrup, artificial sweeteners, GMO's or hydrogenated oils. They offer items that are gluten-free, fair trade, organic or raw on request.

Pura Vida Bakery & Bystro is 100% vegan owned and operated.

images.caption:
My Love 
Two burritos with sun dried tomatoes, cuban black beans, vegan 
cheese, spinach, roasted garlic potatoes, avocado ( seasonal), chipotle, anaheim or poblano peppers (not spicy).

entries.address2: Downtown 1 mile from the Art Factory
entries.directions:
I-15 AND  W CHARLESTON AVE
OR 
Oakey & Western
OR
Martin Luther King & WALL

entries.name: Pop Up Pizza
entries.short_description: Pizza place downtown with vegan options.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Offers a veggie sandwich and other standard coffee shop items.
long_description.text/html: Offers a veggie sandwich and other standard coffee shop items.

entries.name: The Beat Coffeehouse
entries.short_description: Indie coffee shop-bar with vegan options

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Simply Pure is a gourmet vegan and raw food eatery. They claim to use only the freshest organic ingredients. Chef is Stacey Dougan.
long_description.text/html: Simply Pure is a gourmet vegan and raw food eatery. They claim to use only the freshest organic ingredients. Chef is Stacey Dougan.

entries.name: Simply Pure
entries.short_description: gourmet vegan and raw food eatery located in Container Park downtown (old Vegas)

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Juice bar with lunch-type menu items like wraps and salads. In addition to their many smoothies (some of which are vegan), they have Beyond Meat, a vegan chicken, that can be substituted in any sandwich, wrap, or salad.
long_description.text/html: Juice bar with lunch-type menu items like wraps and salads. In addition to their many smoothies (some of which are vegan), they have Beyond Meat, a vegan chicken, that can be substituted in any sandwich, wrap, or salad.

entries.name: Tropical Smoothie Cafe
entries.address1: 2000 Las Vegas Blvd. South, Suite B6

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Located inside The Center, this small cafe offers a variety of healthful organic options including some vegan sandwiches and salads.
long_description.text/html: Located inside The Center, this small cafe offers a variety of healthful organic options including some vegan sandwiches and salads.

entries.name: Bronze Cafe
entries.short_description: Cafe with selection of organic vegan sandwiches and salads

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Great variety of appetizers, soups and salads.  This restaurant also features a large vegetarian menu.
long_description.text/html: Great variety of appetizers, soups and salads. This restaurant also features a large vegetarian menu.

entries.name: Indian Oven
entries.directions: (at Sahara)

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: They have a veggie burger and sandwiches with soy deli slices.
long_description.text/html: They have a veggie burger and sandwiches with soy deli slices.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: A vegan friendly Thai restaurant, with no oyster sauce or fish oils used in the vegetarian section. So it's real vegetarian unlike most Thai restaurants. They also offer wheat meat in a lot of their dishes. Get there early on week days for their lunch specials served with a spring roll, steamed rice, and vegetable soup or salad starting at $5.95.
long_description.text/html: A vegan friendly Thai restaurant, with no oyster sauce or fish oils used in the vegetarian section. So it's real vegetarian unlike most Thai restaurants. They also offer wheat meat in a lot of their dishes. Get there early on week days for their lunch specials served with a spring roll, steamed rice, and vegetable soup or salad starting at $5.95.

entries.name: Komol Thai Restaurant
entries.short_description: Acclaimed Thai restaurant known for its vegan offerings, including seitan and coconut ice cream

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: This is a great veg-friendly restaurant. It is attached to a small natural food store. The menu has one non-vegetarian option, everything else is vegetarian and they have vegan options. They have salads, sandwiches and many options. They offer a full menu. The food is good and they are located only about a mile from the strip on E. Sahara.
long_description.text/html: This is a great veg-friendly restaurant. It is attached to a small natural food store. The menu has one non-vegetarian option, everything else is vegetarian and they have vegan options. They have salads, sandwiches and many options. They offer a full menu. The food is good and they are located only about a mile from the strip on E. Sahara.

entries.name: Rainbow's End Natural Foods & Cafe
entries.short_description: Vegetarian restaurant and natural food store.
entries.directions: Located about a mile east of the strip on Sahara Ave.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: WholeWay Home is a private home available for people to stay at in the Vegas area. It's not precisely a hotel or B&B. See their website for more details.
long_description.text/html: WholeWay Home is a private home available for people to stay at in the Vegas area. It's not precisely a hotel or B&B. See their website for more details.

images.caption: A cozy comfortable vegetarian-freiendly HomeStay near the Strip and Downtown Las Vegas with a Vitamix Blender (and more) so you can have your Green Smoothies - even in Vegas!

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext:
The buffet has a large selection of cuisines. Vegan and vegetarian items are clearly marked.

The food selections change at 3:30pm for dinner.
long_description.text/html:
The buffet has a large selection of cuisines. Vegan and vegetarian items are clearly marked.

The food selections change at 3:30pm for dinner.

entries.name: The Buffet at Wynn Las Vegas
entries.short_description: This buffet has a large selection of food, with many vegan options.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Grand Lux is an upmarket version of the Cheesecake Factory, with the same gigantic menu of over 150 items, large portion sizes, and reasonable prices.  The vegetarian and vegan choices are more numerous and taste better.  Vegans will find items to like among the appetizers, salads, side dishes, pastas, and pizza, by asking for some of the dishes to be made without cheese.  None of the 20 desserts are vegan, unfortunately.
long_description.text/html: Grand Lux is an upmarket version of the Cheesecake Factory, with the same gigantic menu of over 150 items, large portion sizes, and reasonable prices. The vegetarian and vegan choices are more numerous and taste better. Vegans will find items to like among the appetizers, salads, side dishes, pastas, and pizza, by asking for some of the dishes to be made without cheese. None of the 20 desserts are vegan, unfortunately.

entries.name: Grand Lux Cafe
entries.short_description: Eclectic menu with 10-20 vegan items, any time of day or night
entries.directions: There are two locations within a short walk of each other, one inside the Venetian at the basement level, and the other in its sister hotel/casino, The Palazzo

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Offers vegan clam chowder and crab cakes.
long_description.text/html: Offers vegan clam chowder and crab cakes.

entries.name: Lakeside
entries.short_description: A Wynn restaurant with a full vegan menu including mockmeats

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext:
Red 8 is a Chinese restaurant with a modern flare. 

Although the menu appears of offer fewer vegan options than a many Chinese restaurants they do offer a special separate vegan menu that is unique and quite appealing. You won't have to ask for any substitutions or special requests, just order off the vegan menu.
long_description.text/html:
Red 8 is a Chinese restaurant with a modern flare.

Although the menu appears of offer fewer vegan options than a many Chinese restaurants they do offer a special separate vegan menu that is unique and quite appealing. You won't have to ask for any substitutions or special requests, just order off the vegan menu.

entries.name: Springs Cafe
entries.short_description: Located as the Las Vegas Springs Preserve, offers a homemade vegan burger

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext:
You can sit inside or on the terrace to watch people at the pool.

Ask for the vegan menu. Like all Wynn restaurants, they offer a separate selection of vegan items. Among other things, the Terrace Pointe Cafe offers a vegan burger meal. It's a vegan cheeseburger, fries, and a chocolate shake.
long_description.text/html:
You can sit inside or on the terrace to watch people at the pool.

Ask for the vegan menu. Like all Wynn restaurants, they offer a separate selection of vegan items. Among other things, the Terrace Pointe Cafe offers a vegan burger meal. It's a vegan cheeseburger, fries, and a chocolate shake.

entries.name: Terrace Pointe Cafe at Wynn
entries.short_description: casino cafe - home of the $9 vegan burger meal
entries.directions: Inside the Wynn. From the self-parking go past the poker room, past the theater and turn left into a long hallway. Follow the signs for the buffet. The cafe is on the right, across from the buffet.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext:
Wazuzu at Encore offers Pan-Asian flavors inspired by Chinese, Japanese,
Indian, Singaporean and Thai cuisine.
long_description.text/html:
Wazuzu at Encore offers Pan-Asian flavors inspired by Chinese, Japanese,
Indian, Singaporean and Thai cuisine.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: The website has a menu that provides careful guidance for vegans and vegetarians, and there are a satisfying number of choices for both. (http://cpk.com/menu/pdfs/vegetarian.pdf).  Note also that you can ask them to omit the chicken or meat from any of their dozen or so varied large salads without loss of flavor, deriving even more healthy vegan dishes.  The Dakota Smashed Pea soup is a useful vegan option reminiscent of Indian daal.
long_description.text/html: The website has a menu that provides careful guidance for vegans and vegetarians, and there are a satisfying number of choices for both. (http://cpk.com/menu/pdfs/vegetarian.pdf). Note also that you can ask them to omit the chicken or meat from any of their dozen or so varied large salads without loss of flavor, deriving even more healthy vegan dishes. The Dakota Smashed Pea soup is a useful vegan option reminiscent of Indian daal.

entries.name: California Pizza Kitchen
entries.directions: Fashion Show Mall is located off of Las Vegas Boulevard. Across from Wynn Resort and Treasure Island Resort.  This restaurant is located near Nordstroms and Bloomingdales.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: The website has a menu that provides careful guidance for vegans and vegetarians, and there are a satisfying number of choices for both. Note also that you can ask them to omit the chicken or meat from any of their dozen or so varied large salads without loss of flavor, deriving even more healthy vegan dishes.  The pea soup is a useful vegan option. CPK veg options are listed online at http://info.cpk.com/documents/vegetarian_and_vegan_info.pdf
long_description.text/html: The website has a menu that provides careful guidance for vegans and vegetarians, and there are a satisfying number of choices for both. Note also that you can ask them to omit the chicken or meat from any of their dozen or so varied large salads without loss of flavor, deriving even more healthy vegan dishes. The pea soup is a useful vegan option. CPK veg options are listed online at http://info.cpk.com/documents/vegetarian_and_vegan_info.pdf

entries.name: California Pizza Kitchen
entries.directions: Fashion Show Mall is located off of Las Vegas Boulevard. Across from Wynn Resort and Treasure Island Resort.  This restaurant is located near Nordstroms and Bloomingdales.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: The Canyon Ranch Grill is located inside of the Canyon Ranch Spa in The Palazzo Hotel. It specializes in lean foods made with whole grains and fresh fruits and vegetables. There are a number of vegetarian and vegan items on the menu.
long_description.text/html: The Canyon Ranch Grill is located inside of the Canyon Ranch Spa in The Palazzo Hotel. It specializes in lean foods made with whole grains and fresh fruits and vegetables. There are a number of vegetarian and vegan items on the menu.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: casual cafe. breakfast, lunch, desserts, great place to grab a late night snack
long_description.text/html: casual cafe. breakfast, lunch, desserts, great place to grab a late night snack

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext:
Parasol Up is located inside the casino at The Wynn hotel. Parasol Down is located down the escalator from Parasol Up. 

The outdoor seating area at Parasol Down has an incredible view of the waterfall and light show. The drink menu (at both bars) has many exciting vegan martinis and other mixed drinks.
long_description.text/html:
Parasol Up is located inside the casino at The Wynn hotel. Parasol Down is located down the escalator from Parasol Up.

The outdoor seating area at Parasol Down has an incredible view of the waterfall and light show. The drink menu (at both bars) has many exciting vegan martinis and other mixed drinks.

entries.name: Parasol Up - Parasol Down Lounge
entries.short_description: Bar with a Spectacular View at The Wynn
entries.directions: Located in the casino of The Wynn hotel.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Merkato has a vegetarian dinner menu as well as several other vegetarian meals available at other time of day. The Vegetarian Combo is enough to feed three people.
long_description.text/html: Merkato has a vegetarian dinner menu as well as several other vegetarian meals available at other time of day. The Vegetarian Combo is enough to feed three people.

entries.name: Merkato Ethiopian Cafe
entries.short_description: Ethnic food with a number of vegetarian options
entries.directions: It's just about a block north of the UNLV campus.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: The Canyon Ranch Cafe is a "celebration of healthy food" serving a wide variety of wholesome entrees, with no additives or chemicals.  This restaurant also includes a juice bar for smoothies and martinis. They also have a breakfast menu that serves egg white omelets and specialty pancakes.
long_description.text/html: The Canyon Ranch Cafe is a "celebration of healthy food" serving a wide variety of wholesome entrees, with no additives or chemicals. This restaurant also includes a juice bar for smoothies and martinis. They also have a breakfast menu that serves egg white omelets and specialty pancakes.

entries.name: Canyon Ranch Cafe
entries.short_description: Located in the Venetian hotel, this restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and other entrees.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Rani's World Foods is a large vegan-friendly, mostly vegetarian Indian grocery store with an all-vegetarian kitchen. Meals in the kitchen can usually be made vegan. The grocery store includes ingredients for Indian food that can be difficult to find elsewhere.
long_description.text/html: Rani's World Foods is a large vegan-friendly, mostly vegetarian Indian grocery store with an all-vegetarian kitchen. Meals in the kitchen can usually be made vegan. The grocery store includes ingredients for Indian food that can be difficult to find elsewhere.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Chipotle is a national burrito chain, owned by the McDonalds corporation. The rice and black beans are cooked without animal products and Chipotle has a number of vegetables and a variety of vegan salsas to put on the burritos.
long_description.text/html: Chipotle is a national burrito chain, owned by the McDonalds corporation. The rice and black beans are cooked without animal products and Chipotle has a number of vegetables and a variety of vegan salsas to put on the burritos.

entries.name: Chipotle
entries.directions: Located at Harrah's, inside of a food court.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Fresh-made ice cream of various flavors. You can choose to make yours with soymilk rather than dairy milk so it's vegan-friendly.
long_description.text/html: Fresh-made ice cream of various flavors. You can choose to make yours with soymilk rather than dairy milk so it's vegan-friendly.

entries.name: Ice Pan
entries.short_description: soymilk ice cream made to order
entries.directions: In Harrah's on the second floor near Starbucks.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Clean, hip,and funky little place.
long_description.text/html: Clean, hip,and funky little place.

images.caption: Samosa Factory- A Great Place to Eat and have Fun.

entries.name: Samosa Factory Indian Cuisine
entries.short_description: Indian restaurant with vegan and vegetarian options
entries.directions: Northeast side of Sahara and Decatur, next to PT's.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Standard array of lentil, potato, chickpea dishes with injera.
long_description.text/html: Standard array of lentil, potato, chickpea dishes with injera.

entries.name: Gandhi
entries.directions: Two blocks east of the Strip at paradise and Flamingo. Near the Hard Rock. Between UNLV and the Las Vegas Strip. Hidden a bit in a strip mall, backed away from street. Look for Roy's Steak House.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Mint caters specially to vegetarians and vegans, but has something for everyone. Nepalese food is like a less oily, less chili-spiced, but equally flavorful version of Indian food. There is a large selection of international beers on the drinks menu.  They also have regular North Indian food, South Indian food (dosas), and Chaat.
long_description.text/html: Mint caters specially to vegetarians and vegans, but has something for everyone. Nepalese food is like a less oily, less chili-spiced, but equally flavorful version of Indian food. There is a large selection of international beers on the drinks menu. They also have regular North Indian food, South Indian food (dosas), and Chaat.

entries.neighborhood: East of Restaurant Row near strip.
entries.name: Mint Indian Bistro
entries.directions: This is about 1.5 miles east of the Strip, but well worth the drive.  I usually walk, if I'm staying at a centrally located hotel on the Strip.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Japanese upscale sushi restaurant with some distinctive vegan dishes on the menu.  These include: Tofu Steak with mushrooms in a Ponzu Citrus sauce; Miso Nasu Denkaku eggplant; Edamame hummus with Wonton chips; Shishito Japanese peppers.  The usual standbys are also available:  Garden Roll sushi, seaweed salad, and vegetable tempura.
long_description.text/html: Japanese upscale sushi restaurant with some distinctive vegan dishes on the menu. These include: Tofu Steak with mushrooms in a Ponzu Citrus sauce; Miso Nasu Denkaku eggplant; Edamame hummus with Wonton chips; Shishito Japanese peppers. The usual standbys are also available: Garden Roll sushi, seaweed salad, and vegetable tempura.

entries.name: Sushi Roku
entries.directions: Sushi Roku is on the top floor of the Forum Shops tower attached to Caesar's Palace,

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext:
Aside from a couple of candy bars containing bacon, all of the chocolate made by Vosges is vegetarian. Vosges also has some interesting varieties of vegan chocolate bars, such as:

Black Pearl (ginger + wasabi + black sesame seeds + dark chocolate)
Red Fire (Mexican ancho & chipotle chillies + Ceylon cinnamon + dark chocolate) 
Creole (New Orleans chicory coffee + cocoa nibs + Sao Thome bittersweet chocolate) 
Oaxaca (Oaxacan guajillo & pasilla chillies + Tanzanian bittersweet chocolate)
Calindia (cardamom + organic walnuts + dried plums + Venezuelan dark chocolate)

There are also two boxes of bombalinas (individual fruit slices and/or nuts, covered in chocolate) that are vegan. They are:

Naga Mango (dried mango covered in dark chocolate and sweet curry powder)
Black Pearl (dark chocolate covered cashews, covered in wasabi dust and sesame seeds)

NOTE: The Truffles are not vegan.
long_description.text/html:
Aside from a couple of candy bars containing bacon, all of the chocolate made by Vosges is vegetarian. Vosges also has some interesting varieties of vegan chocolate bars, such as:

Black Pearl (ginger + wasabi + black sesame seeds + dark chocolate)
Red Fire (Mexican ancho & chipotle chillies + Ceylon cinnamon + dark chocolate)
Creole (New Orleans chicory coffee + cocoa nibs + Sao Thome bittersweet chocolate)
Oaxaca (Oaxacan guajillo & pasilla chillies + Tanzanian bittersweet chocolate)
Calindia (cardamom + organic walnuts + dried plums + Venezuelan dark chocolate)

There are also two boxes of bombalinas (individual fruit slices and/or nuts, covered in chocolate) that are vegan. They are:

Naga Mango (dried mango covered in dark chocolate and sweet curry powder)
Black Pearl (dark chocolate covered cashews, covered in wasabi dust and sesame seeds)

NOTE: The Truffles are not vegan.

entries.name: Vosges Haut-Chocolat
entries.directions: Located inside The Forum Shops at Caesar's Palace

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Cafe Bellagio has a wide selection of gelato flavors. All of the "sorbet" flavors are vegan and clearly marked.
long_description.text/html: Cafe Bellagio has a wide selection of gelato flavors. All of the "sorbet" flavors are vegan and clearly marked.

entries.name: Cafe Gelato
entries.directions: Located inside the Bellagio hotel, right next to the Gallery of Fine Art.

images.caption: Pumpkin bread. So yummy!
Pumpkin spice muffins. Fall is in the air!
Strawberry lemonade cupcake. A simply sweet strawberry cupcake topped with a zesty lemon frosting.
All of a la mode's products are vegan, gluten free & organic. They are also rice, corn & soy free!
Cupcakes galore! Order online for local delivery & shipping nationwide!
A cupcake gift assortment. What a sweet idea to send!
Yummy caramel sauce. Great on EVERYTHING!!!
a la mode confections are also gluten free. Corn free. Rice free & soy free!
Custom celebration cakes. A carrot cake frosted with cream cheese frosting. Yum!
Football season is here! A yummy red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting decorated to show your team some love!
SO cute! A cupcake tier!
Chocolate chip banana bread

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: They also accept advance orders.
long_description.text/html: They also accept advance orders.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext:
This restaurant has been voted the restaurant with the best vegetarian food in Las Vegas for the past couple of years (by the Review Journal reader poll). They have great vegetarian food... good hummus, pitas, falafel, grape leaves...yum! They are also close to the strip and UNLV.

(Note:  The lentil soup and other soups on the menu may be made with chicken broth or meat broth.  Ask your server.)
long_description.text/html:
This restaurant has been voted the restaurant with the best vegetarian food in Las Vegas for the past couple of years (by the Review Journal reader poll). They have great vegetarian food... good hummus, pitas, falafel, grape leaves...yum! They are also close to the strip and UNLV.

(Note: The lentil soup and other soups on the menu may be made with chicken broth or meat broth. Ask your server.)

entries.name: Paymon's Mediterranean Cafe & Hookah Lounge
entries.short_description: Great Mediterranean restaurant, lots of vegetarian food.
entries.directions:
- Located in the Tiffany Square Plaza
- Southwest corner of Flamingo and Maryland Pkwy
- 5-7 Minutes from the "Strip"
- 1 block north of UNLV

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext:
It's called "Thai Style" and most of the menu is Thai but they also serve some Chinese food. They have a separate vegetarian menu with many items that can be made vegan by asking. 

This Noodle House is located in China Town near Spring Mountain and Valley View. 

It's a small 'hole in the wall' that is often very busy. Prices are low and service is quick.
long_description.text/html:
It's called "Thai Style" and most of the menu is Thai but they also serve some Chinese food. They have a separate vegetarian menu with many items that can be made vegan by asking.

This Noodle House is located in China Town near Spring Mountain and Valley View.

It's a small 'hole in the wall' that is often very busy. Prices are low and service is quick.

entries.name: Thai Style Noodle House
entries.short_description: Inexpensive Asian restaurant with large veg menu
entries.directions: From Spring Mountain turn onto Wynn (one block from Valley View). The restaurant will be in shopping center located on the southeast side of Spring Mountain and Wynn.

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext:
All food on the menu is vegetarian.  Many of the items can be made vegan by request.

They have a large selection of Vietnamese appetizers, sandwiches, and entrees.  Options include a variety of veggie, tofu, and mock meat dishes.
long_description.text/html:
All food on the menu is vegetarian. Many of the items can be made vegan by request.

They have a large selection of Vietnamese appetizers, sandwiches, and entrees. Options include a variety of veggie, tofu, and mock meat dishes.

entries.name: Veggie Delight
entries.directions: off spring mountain blvd. in shopping plaza adjacent (east) to chinatown mall

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: A few veggie items inside a fancy Japanese restaurant in the Bellagio hotel and casino.
long_description.text/html: A few veggie items inside a fancy Japanese restaurant in the Bellagio hotel and casino.

entries.name: Yellowtail Japanese Restaurant and Lounge
entries.directions: Inside the Bellagio, between the poker room and Fix

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: When I was there, buffet included veg sushi, cooked greens, hummus & eggplant dip, couscous, stir-fried veg, Indian chickpea stew, variety of olives, pilafs, biscuits, corn on the cob, sliced fruit including melon, variety of breads, refried beans, and much more.
long_description.text/html: When I was there, buffet included veg sushi, cooked greens, hummus & eggplant dip, couscous, stir-fried veg, Indian chickpea stew, variety of olives, pilafs, biscuits, corn on the cob, sliced fruit including melon, variety of breads, refried beans, and much more.

entries.name: Spice Market Buffet
entries.short_description: Extremely varied buffet in middle of the LV strip
entries.directions: In the Planet Hollywood casino

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Provide large variety of healthy vegetarian dishes
long_description.text/html: Provide large variety of healthy vegetarian dishes

entries.name: Joyful House Chinese Cuisine
entries.short_description: Authentic Chinese Restaurant off the strip

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Usually offers 4-6 vegan flavors of ice cream or more. Can often also do vegan shakes, vegan banana splits, vegan ice cream sandwiches, and more.
long_description.text/html: Usually offers 4-6 vegan flavors of ice cream or more. Can often also do vegan shakes, vegan banana splits, vegan ice cream sandwiches, and more.

entries.name: The Perfect Scoop and Boba Tea
entries.short_description: ice cream parlor with vegan options
entries.directions: From Strip go west on Spring Mountain. Near Ronald's Donuts (which offers vegan options, too).

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: The only vegan donuts in Las Vegas, and they have every kind!  90% of the selection is vegan!
long_description.text/html: The only vegan donuts in Las Vegas, and they have every kind! 90% of the selection is vegan!

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: This restaurant serves many Ethiopian entrees.  They also have breakfast along with a variety of vegetarian dishes.
long_description.text/html: This restaurant serves many Ethiopian entrees. They also have breakfast along with a variety of vegetarian dishes.

entries.name: Cottage Cafe
entries.directions: 1 mile East of strip, near Hard Rock Hotel

long_description.text/vnd.vegguide.org-wikitext: Juice bar with lunch-type menu items like wraps and salads. In addition to their many smoothies (some of which are vegan), they have Beyond Meat, a vegan chicken, that can be substituted in any sandwich, wrap, or salad.
long_description.text/html: Juice bar with lunch-type menu items like wraps and salads. In addition to their many smoothies (some of which are vegan), they have Beyond Meat, a vegan chicken, that can be substituted in any sandwich, wrap, or salad.
